document_data.name: Ravenak
document_data.text: <nowiki>[Ravenak]</nowiki> is a cur unfit to sniff at honest [[dog]]s that go upon four legs.
document_data.source: Zaranda Star giving her humble opinion of the mad earl
document_data.mainbody: Earl Ravenak was hated by [[Baron Hardisty]] and [[Zaranda Star]] alike, and his Hairheads were opposed to another major faction in Zazesspur, the [[Social Justice League]], which consisted primarily of [[halfling]]s.
document_data.Activities: Earl Ravenak spent a large amount of his time preaching through a [[speaking-tube]] from the streets of Zazesspur a message that all non-[[human]]s should be driven from [[Tethyr]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, when Zaranda Star visited Zazesspur, she heard Ravenak give a speech on one occasion and also encountered several of his fanatical followers.
